verses.roman:
krodha kari' rāsa chāḍi' gelā māna kari'
tāṅre nā dekhiyā vyākula haila śrī-hari

synonyms: krodha kari'-becoming angry; rāsa chāḍi'-leaving the rāsa dance; gelā—went; māna kari'-being resentful; tāṅre—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; nā dekhiyā—not seeing; vyākula—very anxious; haila—became; śrī-hari—Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "When Rādhārāṇī left the rāsa dance out of anger and resentment, Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa became very anxious because He could not see Her.
